note.p: Army officer and diplomat. Captain in the seventy-first Highland Light Infantry. Served in the Crimean War, the Indian Mutiny, and the 1863 campaign against the hill tribes on the North-West Frontier of India. British consul in the Island of Réunion, 1867–74, Stockholm, 1874–9, and later in Nantes and Baltimore.
London Gazette, 20 February 1874, p. 766, and 10 October 1879, p. 5831
